title: Cumbrian Rain
description: Cumbrian Rain (The Weather Tales) [Kindle Edition] Tenya Sharp Ingalls contemporary adventure romance that weaves a web of international intrigue and danger...Attempting to escape her grief, tragically widowed Annora Lang travels to Cumbria, England to bury herself in research for her doctoral thesis, but when she meets the mysterious Tad, she discovers her own sinister past has come back to haunt her. Caught between her fear of one man and her love for another, can Annora be the hero this time, instead of the victim? ... Publisher: Cross-Culture, Inc. Publishing (March 2, 2012)
author: Tenya Sharp Ingalls
